titleStmt.title: A true relation of the unjust, cruel, and barbarous proceedings against the English, at Amboyna in the East-Indies, by the Netherlandish Governour & Council there. Also the copie of a pamphlet of the Dutch in defence of the action. With remarks upon the whole matter. Published by authoritie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Will. Bentley, for Will. Hope, at the Anchor under S. Bartholowmew Church near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The 'pamphlet of the Dutch in defence' has its own titlepage which reads: A true declaration of the news that came out of the East-Indies, with the Pinnace called the Hare, arrived in Texel in June, 1624.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
